document.full_text: forestry experts were dumbfounded by representative dana rohrabacher's suggestion, noting that the world's forests currently absorb far more carbon dioxide than they emit -- capturing roughly one-third of all man-made emissions.
document.title: republican's climate solution: clear-cut the rain forest
lines_and_colors: forestry experts were dumbfounded by representative dana rohrabacher's suggestion, noting that the world's forests currently absorb far more carbon dioxide than they emit -- capturing roughly one-third of all man-made emissions.
